comments.body: ~~This is not important but implementation's argument name is `d` instead of `date`.~~
~~Same thing. This is not important but implementation's argument name is `d` instead of `date`.~~

Ah, but actually I used `year` instead of `y` because document is `year` but implementation is `y` :)
Then why don't we use `date` instead of `d` for all of `Date` arguments?
Done, amended. `month` used, not `mon` (used in both form in the source), thx!
